column4: Ifconfig sees a wireless card, but no ip address is a assigned to it, also ifup reports no leases, and the card is sleeping?
have you configured ESSID ans key using iwconfig ?
it isn't my problem, I'm trying to help wireless_ solve his, and I'm stumped.
Not the impression I got from the website?
I was guessing at the name for the next LTS?
ah, now I see, I need to tune up my keyboard.
welcome to the party, that is what we thought about apt-get, but it isn't installed.
it obviously is, since which apt-get returned somrthing
, alyssa_  I was going on this info. <sasuun> Package `apt-get' is not installed and no info is available.
apt-get is not a package in itself
forward the appropriate port in your router
Ok, what about routing? I'm showing a local addr connection, and a remote addr, connection, don't I have to tell the box at the libraray, how to reach my box?
you need to use the WAN IP (the one you get from your ISP)
Ok, I'll give it a try.
